welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Great Bookham, a charming village in the heart of the United Kingdom! Known for its picturesque countryside and rich history, we invite you to explore and discover this hidden gem for yourself. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gatwick Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The secondary terminal at Gatwick Airport, primarily serving international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Serving domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest terminal, serving mainly Star Alliance airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Serving long-haul flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Serving mainly SkyTeam airlines and some other international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: Serving mainly British Airways and its partner airlines.

wifi.note: Free for 45 minutes, then charges apply.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northolt Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Northolt Airport caters to VIP and private flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access the airport's free WiFi network throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Blackbushe Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal building.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Redhill Aerodrome serves as the primary hub for all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Redhill Aerodrome caters to private and charter flights, providing a more exclusive and personalized experience.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at RAF Station Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at RAF Station Airport is used exclusively for military flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the WiFi network for free, but a valid military ID or special access code is required.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London Elstree Aerodrome Airport handles all commercial flights and provides various amenities for passengers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at London Elstree Aerodrome Airport caters to private and chartered flights, offering exclusive services for VIP passengers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lasham Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Goodwood Airport serves commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Goodwood Airport caters to VIP and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
